Original meaning 本义: Meaning soft.

Importance by frequency 常用频率:

Shuowen 说文解字: 喪車也從車而聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 輭 from cart (车)車 chē and soft-beard 耎 ruǎn C501 軟<輭> simp 软.

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
(- the wheels of heavy carts were used to thresh rice, making them "soft". The beard is also "soft").

Simplification rule :

Simplification rule explained :

Variant rule : C501 軟<輭>

Variant rule clarification :
軟 (soft, weak, flexible) TW 輭 <soft, weak, flexible>

輭字的基本解释

輭
ruǎn
同“软”。

輭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ruǎn］
［《廣韻》而兖切，上獮，日。］
同“軟1”。
[②]［ér］
［《集韻》人之切，平之，日。］
同“輀1”。

輭字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　輭； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1245第28
【廣韻】而兗切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】乳兗切，?音軟。【玉篇】柔也。【後漢·明帝紀】安車輭輪。【註】以蒲裹輪，令柔輭也。　又人柔弱亦謂之輭。【史記·貨殖傳】妻子輭弱。　俗作軟。或作轜。

小篆楷体

暂无。

[Guang Yun] and Yan cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Milk Yan cut, soft sound. [Jade articles] Soft too. 【Later Han·Ming Emperor Ji】an car wheel. [Note] Wrap the wheel with pu, so that the softness is also.　It's also called 輭 to be weak. 【Historical Records·Huo Shi Chuan】Wife is weak.　Vulgar is soft. Or as 轜.
